author: seanoc
msg: Fix for [ #305220 ] ServiceImpl.getPort(Class) looks like it will throw an NPE

author: dkulp
msg: * Revert to surefire 2.1.3 as the reporting in 2.2 is completely broken.   Even if the tests are fixed, the reporting is broken.

author: dkulp
msg: Update plugins to latest releases, fixed tests, changed checkstyle/pmd to use plugins
* The new surefire runs tests in a different order exposing a LOT of problems in the tests.   Fixed all the ones that were causing issues for me.
* Change PMD and Checkstyle from using a custom antrun thing to the actual Maven plugins  (note: PMD doesn't check test sources now.  Vote at: http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MPMD-30 )
